title: Now is the time to put on your glasses
creator_credit: Norman McLaren, Evelyn Lambart and ONF | NFB
brief_description: The right eye print of a 3-D films commissioned by the British Film Institute for the Festival of Britain. Photographed paper cutouts and images drawn directly on film stock were given single-frame animation. Stereoscopy was achieved by photographing and drawing two visuals (one for the left eye, one for the right eye) with controlled displacement of the elements in relationship to each other. The hand-drawn sound was also composed and recorded on two separate bands for stereoscopic playing. (Award: Toronto.)
